title: Obed Wild & Scenic River: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun               Park Fun         Our park rangers participating in the 2012 Hola Festival in downtown Knoxville.   Obed Wild and Scenic River is a fun place for kids to explore. It's also a great place to learn about the river, plants, animals, and the beautiful sandstone bluffs that stand on each side of the river.  The park's visitor center is also a great place to learn more about the park, collect park brochures, and check out our exhibits. This page will include links to different activities for kids. We will also be presenting information on different events that the park offers throughout the year.  Please check back to this page from time to time to see what new things are happening at the Obed Wild and Scenic River! Upcoming Events: Weekly Preschool Storytime
